review: I met with Dr. Umesh! He was very helpful and suggested a complete solution for strengthening gums and preventing future plague buildup. Was afraid of the pain but he made it absolutely painless. Would recommend this Doctor and clinic to everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sushma and Dr. Umesh are professional, friendly  and polite. They make the patient comfortable before treatment. We have had multiple sittings with them for my wife's treatment for cleaning, filling and implant. All sitting went well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I recently got my root canal done here and the procedure was very smooth and I didn’t have any pain throughout the procedure. Doctor was very friendly and would definitely recommend for any tooth problems here .

Visited Denta uno for tooth crowning.. my treatment was conducted by Dr Sushma.. she is such a sweet person.. and she was sooo patient with all my queries. She conducted all the procedures soo well, till I was completely satisfied with the results.. and I am soooo happy with the final outcome.. the crowns look sooo natural..  thank u..  doc..!!!
reply_text: I am glad you liked them...thank you for being so co operative...

review: After having had a previous experience that was not ideal, I was reluctant to find a new dentist that I could trust. Dr Sushma Umesh took the time to explain details of what my treatment plan was and the “ why behind the what “. Great job ..! Highly Recommended ..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Misaligned Teeth,Dental Cavities,
review: I contacted doctor Sushma for multiple fillings and my experience has been very smooth and comfortable. I truly appreciate doctor for her patience and professionalism with which my dental work was conducted. Highly recommended doctor for any dental issues and trust that you will have a wonderful experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was such an wonderful experience....Dr sushma is highly skilled and knowledgeable...I had got my  EMax veneers done for front teeth...They look absolutely natural.... Really appreciate your artistic execution and giving me the confidence to smile....she is one of the best esthetic dentist I have ever met....I strongly recommend her for your all dental needs

review: My experience with Denta Uni Dental clinic has always been great. Dr. Sushma is very caring and explains everything in detail. I got my endocrown fixed by her and my teeth feels just as new.

Straight to point, explained well, procedure done neat.
No corporate drama, well maintained clinic. 
Would definitely recommend other.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Both, Dr. Sushma and Dr. Umesh are very friendly and experienced doctors. They explained the issue very well and made sure the patient is well informed and educated about the procedure.
